Note:
Press the 'Mulligan' button to
draw your opening hand OR mulligan.

When in the Untap Step, press 'Untap'
to untap all of your permanents.

When in the Draw Step, press 'Draw'
to draw 1 card to your hand per click.

Press the 'Pass' button to pass
the turn between players.

Click counters to bring up +/- options.

function onObjectEnterScriptingZone(zone, enter_object)
    if enter_object.tag == 'Card' then
        for i, v in ipairs(handzones) do
            if zone.getGUID() == handzones[i] then
                local cardcount = 1
                local counttext = getObjectFromGUID(handsizetext[i])
                local zoneobjects = zone.getObjects()
                for j, k in ipairs(zoneobjects) do
                    if k.tag == 'Card' then
                        cardcount = cardcount + 1
                    end
                end
                if cardcount == 1 then
                    counttext.TextTool.setValue('1 Card in Hand')
                else
                    counttext.TextTool.setValue(cardcount..' Cards in Hand')
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function onObjectLeaveScriptingZone(zone, leave_object)
    if leave_object.tag == 'Card' then
        for i, v in ipairs(handzones) do
            if zone.getGUID() == handzones[i] then
                local cardcount = 0
                local counttext = getObjectFromGUID(handsizetext[i])
                local zoneobjects = zone.getObjects()
                for j, k in ipairs(zoneobjects) do
                    if k.tag == 'Card' then
                        cardcount = cardcount + 1
                    end
                end
                if cardcount == 1 then
                    counttext.TextTool.setValue('1 Card in Hand')
                else
                    counttext.TextTool.setValue(cardcount..' Cards in Hand')
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function resetSteps()
    for i, v in ipairs(colors) do
        local referenceobject = getObjectFromGUID(stepbuttons[i][12])
        local referenceposition = referenceobject.getPosition()
        local referencerotation = referenceobject.getRotation()
        for j, v in ipairs(stepbuttons[i]) do
            local resetobject = getObjectFromGUID(stepbuttons[i][j])
            local resetposition = resetobject.getPosition()
            resetobject.setRotation(referencerotation)
            resetobject.setPosition({resetposition.x,referenceposition.y,resetposition.z})
        end
    end
    currentstep = 0
end

function untapSwap(me, player)
    if player ~= currentcolor and player ~= "Black" then
        return 1
    end
    if currentstep == 1 then
        local zonetountap = getObjectFromGUID(untapzones[currentplayer])
        local zoneobjects = zonetountap.getObjects()

        for i, v in ipairs(zoneobjects) do
            if v.tag == "Card" then
                local referenceobject = getObjectFromGUID(boards[currentplayer])
                local rotation = referenceobject.getRotation()
                local vrotation = v.getRotation()
                v.setRotationSmooth({vrotation.x,rotation.y,vrotation.z})
            end
        end
    else
        resetSteps()
        for i, v in ipairs(colors) do
            local referenceobject = getObjectFromGUID(stepbuttons[i][12])
            local referencerotation = referenceobject.getRotation()
            local stepobject = getObjectFromGUID(stepbuttons[i][1])
            local steprotation = stepobject.getRotation()
            stepobject.setRotation({180,steprotation.y,steprotation.z})
            local stepposition = stepobject.getPosition()
            stepobject.setPosition({stepposition.x,stepposition.y+0.2,stepposition.z})
            steprotation = stepobject.getRotation()
            stepobject.setRotation({steprotation.x,referencerotation.y,steprotation.z})
        end
        currentstep = 1
    end
end

function upkeepSwap(me, player)
    if player ~= currentcolor then
        return 1
    end
    resetSteps()
    for i, v in ipairs(colors) do
        local referenceobject = getObjectFromGUID(stepbuttons[i][12])
        local referencerotation = referenceobject.getRotation()
        local stepobject = getObjectFromGUID(stepbuttons[i][2])
        local steprotation = stepobject.getRotation()
        stepobject.setRotation({180,steprotation.y,steprotation.z})
        local stepposition = stepobject.getPosition()
        stepobject.setPosition({stepposition.x,stepposition.y+0.2,stepposition.z})
        steprotation = stepobject.getRotation()
        stepobject.setRotation({steprotation.x,referencerotation.y,steprotation.z})
    end
    currentstep = 2
end

function drawSwap(me, player)
    if player ~= currentcolor then
        return 1
    end
    if currentstep == 3 then
        local deckzone = getObjectFromGUID(deckzones[currentplayer])
        local handzone = getObjectFromGUID(handzones[currentplayer])
        local handposition = handzone.getPosition()
        local zoneobjects = deckzone.getObjects()
        for i, v in ipairs(zoneobjects) do
            if v.tag == "Card" then
               v.setPositionSmooth({handposition.x,2,handposition.z})
            elseif v.tag == "Deck" then
               v.dealToColor(1, currentcolor)
            end
        end
    else
        resetSteps()
        for i, v in ipairs(colors) do
            local referenceobject = getObjectFromGUID(stepbuttons[i][12])
            local referencerotation = referenceobject.getRotation()
            local stepobject = getObjectFromGUID(stepbuttons[i][3])
            local steprotation = stepobject.getRotation()
            stepobject.setRotation({180,steprotation.y,steprotation.z})
            local stepposition = stepobject.getPosition()
            stepobject.setPosition({stepposition.x,stepposition.y+0.2,stepposition.z})
            steprotation = stepobject.getRotation()
            stepobject.setRotation({steprotation.x,referencerotation.y,steprotation.z})
        end
        currentstep = 3
    end
end

        local referenceobject = getObjectFromGUID(stepbuttons[i][12])
        local referencerotation = referenceobject.getRotation()
        local stepobject = getObjectFromGUID(stepbuttons[i][11])
        local steprotation = stepobject.getRotation()
        stepobject.setRotation({180,steprotation.y,steprotation.z})
        local stepposition = stepobject.getPosition()
        stepobject.setPosition({stepposition.x,stepposition.y+0.2,stepposition.z})
        steprotation = stepobject.getRotation()
        stepobject.setRotation({steprotation.x,referencerotation.y,steprotation.z})
    end
    currentstep = 11
end

function passButton()
    currentplayer = currentplayer + 1
    if currentplayer >= 9 then
        currentplayer = 1
    end
    if currentplayer == 1 and whiteseated == 0 then
        currentplayer = currentplayer + 1
    end
    if currentplayer == 2 and redseated == 0 then
        currentplayer = currentplayer + 1
    end
    if currentplayer == 3 and orangeseated == 0 then
        currentplayer = currentplayer + 1
    end
    if currentplayer == 4 and yellowseated == 0 then
        currentplayer = currentplayer + 1
    end
    if currentplayer == 5 and greenseated == 0 then
        currentplayer = currentplayer + 1
    end
    if currentplayer == 6 and blueseated == 0 then
        currentplayer = currentplayer + 1
    end
    if currentplayer == 7 and purpleseated == 0 then
        currentplayer = currentplayer + 1
    end
    if currentplayer == 8 and pinkseated == 0 then
        if whiteseated == 1 then
            currentplayer = 1
        elseif redseated == 1 then
            currentplayer = 2
        elseif orangeseated == 1 then
            currentplayer = 3
        elseif yellowseated == 1 then
            currentplayer = 4
        elseif greenseated == 1 then
            currentplayer = 5
        elseif blueseated == 1 then
            currentplayer = 6
        elseif purpleseated == 1 then
            currentplayer = 7
        elseif pinkseated == 1 then
            currentplayer = 8
        else
            currentplayer = 1
        end
    end
    currentcolor = colors[currentplayer]
    local underboard = getObjectFromGUID(boards[currentplayer])
    local spot = getObjectFromGUID(spots[currentplayer])
    local spotposition = spot.getPosition()
    local spotrotation = spot.getRotation()
    local underposition = underboard.getPosition()
    local underrotation = underboard.getRotation()
    activeplayerboard.setRotation(underrotation)
    activeplayerboard.setPosition({underposition.x,underposition.y+0.01,underposition.z})
    key.setPosition({spotposition.x,spotposition.y+3.33,spotposition.z})
    key.setRotation(spotrotation)
    resetSteps()
    untapSwap(me, "Black")
end

function sitPlayer(sitting)
    if sitting.sitcolor == 'White' then
        whiteseated = 1
    elseif sitting.sitcolor == 'Red' then
        redseated = 1
    elseif sitting.sitcolor == 'Orange' then
        orangeseated = 1
    elseif sitting.sitcolor == 'Yellow' then
        yellowseated = 1
    elseif sitting.sitcolor == 'Green' then
        greenseated = 1
    elseif sitting.sitcolor == 'Blue' then
        blueseated = 1
    elseif sitting.sitcolor == 'Purple' then
        purpleseated = 1
    elseif sitting.sitcolor == 'Pink' then
        pinkseated = 1
    end
end

function leavePlayer(leaving)
    if leaving.leavecolor == 'White' then
        whiteseated = 0
    elseif leaving.leavecolor == 'Red' then
        redseated = 0
    elseif leaving.leavecolor == 'Orange' then
        orangeseated = 0
    elseif leaving.leavecolor == 'Yellow' then

    elseif leaving.leavecolor == 'Green' then

        blueseated = 0

    end
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local basic_buttons = {}
local unit = 1
value = 0
value2 = 0
value3 = 0

basic_buttons['poison'] = {click_function='poisonUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value),position={-1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['exper'] = {click_function='experUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value2),position={0,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['energy'] = {click_function='energyUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value3),position={1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value, value2=value2, value3=value3}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        value2 = loaded_data.value2
        value3 = loaded_data.value3
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        value2 = 0
        value3 = 0
        unit = 1

    end
    value = 0
    value2 = 0
    value3 = 0
    for i,v in pairs(basic_buttons) do
        self.createButton(v)
    end
end

-- functions
function poisonUp(me, player)
    if editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'White' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {-1.55,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {-1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 1
    elseif editing == 1 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value)
    basic_button.index = 0
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue(magn)
    value = value + magn
    updatevalue()
end

function minus()
    changevalue(-1)
end

function plus()
    changevalue(1)
end

function experUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'White' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus2'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {0,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus2'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {0,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 2
    elseif editing == 2 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue2()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value2)
    basic_button.index = 1
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue2(magn)
    value2 = value2 + magn
    updatevalue2()
end

function minus2()
    changevalue2(-1)
end

function plus2()
    changevalue2(1)
end

function energyUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'White' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus3'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {1.55,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus3'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 3
    elseif editing == 3 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue3()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value3)
    basic_button.index = 2
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue3(magn)
    value3 = value3 + magn
    updatevalue3()
end

function minus3()
    changevalue3(-1)
end

function plus3()
    changevalue3(1)
end

local buttons = {}
local value = 0
local button_value = {}
button_value.index = 0
button_value.click_function = 'doNothing'
button_value.function_owner = self
button_value.label = tostring(value)
button_value.position = {0,0.1,0}
button_value.width = 400
button_value.height = 400
button_value.font_size = 350
table.insert(buttons, button_value)

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        unit = 1
    end

    for _, button in ipairs(buttons) do
        self.createButton(button)
    end
end

-- functions
function doNothing(me, player)
    if player ~= 'White' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus'
        button_minus.function_owner = self

        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {0,0.1,1.1}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        table.insert(buttons, button_minus)
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus'
        button_plus.function_owner = self

        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {0,0.1,-1.1}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        table.insert(buttons, button_plus)
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 1
    elseif editing == 1 then
        self.removeButton(1)
        self.removeButton(2)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue()
    button_value.label = tostring(value)
    self.editButton(button_value)
end

function changevalue(magn)
    value = value + (magn*unit)
    updatevalue()
end

function minus()
    changevalue(-1)
end

function plus()
    changevalue(1)
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local basic_buttons = {}
local unit = 1
value = 0
value2 = 0
value3 = 0

basic_buttons['poison'] = {click_function='poisonUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value),position={-1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['exper'] = {click_function='experUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value2),position={0,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['energy'] = {click_function='energyUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value3),position={1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value, value2=value2, value3=value3}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        value2 = loaded_data.value2
        value3 = loaded_data.value3
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        value2 = 0
        value3 = 0
        unit = 1

    end
    value = 0
    value2 = 0
    value3 = 0
    for i,v in pairs(basic_buttons) do
        self.createButton(v)
    end
end

-- functions
function poisonUp(me, player)
    if editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Red' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {-1.55,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {-1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 1
    elseif editing == 1 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value)
    basic_button.index = 0
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue(magn)
    value = value + magn
    updatevalue()
end

function minus()
    changevalue(-1)
end

function plus()
    changevalue(1)
end

function experUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Red' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus2'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {0,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus2'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {0,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 2
    elseif editing == 2 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue2()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value2)
    basic_button.index = 1
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue2(magn)
    value2 = value2 + magn
    updatevalue2()
end

function minus2()
    changevalue2(-1)
end

function plus2()
    changevalue2(1)
end

function energyUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Red' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {1.55,0.21,1.4}

        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 3
    elseif editing == 3 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function onLoad(save_state)
   local button_parameters = {}
   button_parameters.click_function = 'Plus'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '+1'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, -0.7}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'Minus'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '-1'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, 0.7}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'PlusFive'

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local buttons = {}
local value = 0
local button_value = {}
button_value.index = 0
button_value.click_function = 'doNothing'
button_value.function_owner = self
button_value.label = tostring(value)
button_value.position = {0,0.1,0}
button_value.width = 400
button_value.height = 400
button_value.font_size = 350
table.insert(buttons, button_value)

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        unit = 1
    end

    for _, button in ipairs(buttons) do
        self.createButton(button)
    end
end

-- functions
function doNothing(me, player)
    if player ~= 'Green' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus'
        button_minus.function_owner = self

        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {0,0.1,1.1}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        table.insert(buttons, button_minus)
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus'
        button_plus.function_owner = self

        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {0,0.1,-1.1}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        table.insert(buttons, button_plus)
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 1
    elseif editing == 1 then
        self.removeButton(1)
        self.removeButton(2)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue()
    button_value.label = tostring(value)
    self.editButton(button_value)
end

function changevalue(magn)
    value = value + (magn*unit)
    updatevalue()
end

function minus()
    changevalue(-1)
end

function plus()
    changevalue(1)
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local basic_buttons = {}
local unit = 1
value = 0
value2 = 0
value3 = 0

basic_buttons['poison'] = {click_function='poisonUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value),position={-1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['exper'] = {click_function='experUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value2),position={0,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['energy'] = {click_function='energyUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value3),position={1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value, value2=value2, value3=value3}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        value2 = loaded_data.value2
        value3 = loaded_data.value3
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        value2 = 0
        value3 = 0
        unit = 1

    end
    value = 0
    value2 = 0
    value3 = 0
    for i,v in pairs(basic_buttons) do
        self.createButton(v)
    end
end

-- functions
function poisonUp(me, player)
    if editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Green' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {-1.55,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {-1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 1
    elseif editing == 1 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value)
    basic_button.index = 0
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue(magn)
    value = value + magn
    updatevalue()
end

function minus()
    changevalue(-1)
end

function plus()
    changevalue(1)
end

function experUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Green' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus2'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {0,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus2'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {0,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 2
    elseif editing == 2 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue2()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value2)
    basic_button.index = 1
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue2(magn)
    value2 = value2 + magn
    updatevalue2()
end

function minus2()
    changevalue2(-1)
end

end

    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Green' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then

end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local buttons = {}
local value = 0
local button_value = {}
button_value.index = 0
button_value.click_function = 'doNothing'
button_value.function_owner = self
button_value.label = tostring(value)
button_value.position = {0,0.1,0}
button_value.width = 400
button_value.height = 400
button_value.font_size = 350
table.insert(buttons, button_value)

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        unit = 1
    end

    for _, button in ipairs(buttons) do
        self.createButton(button)
    end
end

-- functions
function doNothing(me, player)
    if player ~= 'Blue' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus'
        button_minus.function_owner = self

        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {0,0.1,1.1}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        table.insert(buttons, button_minus)
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus'
        button_plus.function_owner = self

        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {0,0.1,-1.1}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        table.insert(buttons, button_plus)
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 1
    elseif editing == 1 then
        self.removeButton(1)
        self.removeButton(2)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue()
    button_value.label = tostring(value)
    self.editButton(button_value)
end

function changevalue(magn)
    value = value + (magn*unit)
    updatevalue()
end

function minus()
    changevalue(-1)
end

function plus()
    changevalue(1)
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local basic_buttons = {}
local unit = 1
value = 0
value2 = 0
value3 = 0

basic_buttons['poison'] = {click_function='poisonUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value),position={-1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['exper'] = {click_function='experUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value2),position={0,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['energy'] = {click_function='energyUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value3),position={1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value, value2=value2, value3=value3}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        value2 = loaded_data.value2
        value3 = loaded_data.value3
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        value2 = 0
        value3 = 0
        unit = 1

    end
    value = 0
    value2 = 0
    value3 = 0
    for i,v in pairs(basic_buttons) do
        self.createButton(v)
    end
end

-- functions
function poisonUp(me, player)
    if editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Blue' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {-1.55,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {-1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 1
    elseif editing == 1 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value)
    basic_button.index = 0
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue(magn)
    value = value + magn
    updatevalue()
end

function minus()
    changevalue(-1)
end

function plus()
    changevalue(1)
end

function experUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Blue' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus2'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {0,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus2'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {0,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 2
    elseif editing == 2 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue2()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value2)
    basic_button.index = 1
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue2(magn)
    value2 = value2 + magn
    updatevalue2()
end

function minus2()
    changevalue2(-1)
end

function plus2()
    changevalue2(1)
end

function energyUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Blue' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus3'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {1.55,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus3'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 3
    elseif editing == 3 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue3()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value3)
    basic_button.index = 2
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue3(magn)
    value3 = value3 + magn
    updatevalue3()
end

function minus3()
    changevalue3(-1)
end

function plus3()
    changevalue3(1)
end

ObjectStates.Name: Domino
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad(save_state)
   local button_parameters = {}
   button_parameters.click_function = 'Plus'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '+1'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, -0.7}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'Minus'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '-1'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, 0.7}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'PlusFive'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '+5'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, -2.1}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'MinusFive'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '-5'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, 2.1}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   function Plus(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Blue' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Blue'}
       Global.call('lifePlus', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()+1))
   end

   function Minus(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Blue' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Blue'}
       Global.call('lifeMinus', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()-1))
   end

   function PlusFive(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Blue' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Blue'}
       Global.call('lifePlusFive', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()+5))
   end

   function MinusFive(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Blue' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Blue'}
       Global.call('lifeMinusFive', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()-5))
   end
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local basic_buttons = {}
local unit = 1
value = 0
value2 = 0
value3 = 0

basic_buttons['poison'] = {click_function='poisonUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value),position={-1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['exper'] = {click_function='experUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value2),position={0,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['energy'] = {click_function='energyUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value3),position={1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value, value2=value2, value3=value3}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        value2 = loaded_data.value2
        value3 = loaded_data.value3
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        value2 = 0
        value3 = 0
        unit = 1

    end
    value = 0
    value2 = 0
    value3 = 0
    for i,v in pairs(basic_buttons) do
        self.createButton(v)
    end
end

-- functions
function poisonUp(me, player)
    if editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Orange' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {-1.55,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {-1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 1
    elseif editing == 1 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value)
    basic_button.index = 0
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue(magn)
    value = value + magn
    updatevalue()
end

function minus()
    changevalue(-1)
end

function plus()
    changevalue(1)
end

function experUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Orange' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus2'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {0,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus2'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {0,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 2
    elseif editing == 2 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue2()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value2)
    basic_button.index = 1
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue2(magn)
    value2 = value2 + magn
    updatevalue2()
end

function minus2()
    changevalue2(-1)
end

function plus2()
    changevalue2(1)
end

function energyUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Orange' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus3'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {1.55,0.21,1.4}

        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300

        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 3
    elseif editing == 3 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad(save_state)
   local button_parameters = {}
   button_parameters.click_function = 'Plus'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '+1'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, -0.7}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'Minus'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '-1'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, 0.7}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'PlusFive'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '+5'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, -2.1}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'MinusFive'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '-5'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, 2.1}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   function Plus(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Orange' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Orange'}
       Global.call('lifePlus', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()+1))
   end

   function Minus(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Orange' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Orange'}
       Global.call('lifeMinus', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()-1))
   end

   function PlusFive(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Orange' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Orange'}
       Global.call('lifePlusFive', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()+5))
   end

   function MinusFive(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Orange' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Orange'}
       Global.call('lifeMinusFive', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()-5))
   end
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local basic_buttons = {}
local unit = 1
value = 0
value2 = 0
value3 = 0

basic_buttons['poison'] = {click_function='poisonUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value),position={-1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['exper'] = {click_function='experUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value2),position={0,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['energy'] = {click_function='energyUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value3),position={1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value, value2=value2, value3=value3}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        value2 = loaded_data.value2
        value3 = loaded_data.value3
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        value2 = 0
        value3 = 0
        unit = 1

    end
    value = 0
    value2 = 0
    value3 = 0
    for i,v in pairs(basic_buttons) do
        self.createButton(v)
    end
end

-- functions
function poisonUp(me, player)
    if editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Yellow' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {-1.55,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {-1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 1
    elseif editing == 1 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value)
    basic_button.index = 0
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue(magn)
    value = value + magn
    updatevalue()
end

function minus()
    changevalue(-1)
end

function plus()
    changevalue(1)
end

function experUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Yellow' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus2'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {0,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus2'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {0,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 2
    elseif editing == 2 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue2()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value2)
    basic_button.index = 1
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue2(magn)
    value2 = value2 + magn
    updatevalue2()
end

function minus2()
    changevalue2(-1)
end

function plus2()
    changevalue2(1)
end

function energyUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Yellow' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus3'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {1.55,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus3'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 3
    elseif editing == 3 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue3()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value3)
    basic_button.index = 2
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

    updatevalue3()
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad(save_state)
   local button_parameters = {}
   button_parameters.click_function = 'Plus'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '+1'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, -0.7}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'Minus'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '-1'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, 0.7}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'PlusFive'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '+5'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, -2.1}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'MinusFive'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '-5'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, 2.1}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   function Plus(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Yellow' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Yellow'}
       Global.call('lifePlus', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()+1))
   end

   function Minus(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Yellow' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Yellow'}
       Global.call('lifeMinus', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()-1))
   end

   function PlusFive(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Yellow' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Yellow'}
       Global.call('lifePlusFive', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()+5))
   end

   function MinusFive(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Yellow' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Yellow'}
       Global.call('lifeMinusFive', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()-5))
   end
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local basic_buttons = {}
local unit = 1
value = 0
value2 = 0
value3 = 0

basic_buttons['poison'] = {click_function='poisonUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value),position={-1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['exper'] = {click_function='experUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value2),position={0,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['energy'] = {click_function='energyUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value3),position={1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value, value2=value2, value3=value3}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        value2 = loaded_data.value2
        value3 = loaded_data.value3
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        value2 = 0
        value3 = 0
        unit = 1

    end
    value = 0
    value2 = 0
    value3 = 0
    for i,v in pairs(basic_buttons) do
        self.createButton(v)
    end
end

-- functions
function poisonUp(me, player)
    if editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Purple' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {-1.55,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {-1.55,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 1
    elseif editing == 1 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value)
    basic_button.index = 0
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue(magn)
    value = value + magn
    updatevalue()
end

function minus()
    changevalue(-1)
end

function plus()
    changevalue(1)
end

function experUp(me, player)
    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Purple' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then
        local button_minus = {}

        button_minus.click_function = 'minus2'
        button_minus.function_owner = self
        button_minus.label = '-1'
        button_minus.position = {0,0.21,1.4}
        button_minus.width = 300
        button_minus.height = 300
        button_minus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_minus)

        local button_plus = {}

        button_plus.click_function = 'plus2'
        button_plus.function_owner = self
        button_plus.label = '+1'
        button_plus.position = {0,0.21,-0.4}
        button_plus.width = 300
        button_plus.height = 300
        button_plus.font_size = 200
        self.createButton(button_plus)

        editing = 2
    elseif editing == 2 then
        self.removeButton(3)
        self.removeButton(4)

        editing = 0
    end
end

function updatevalue2()
    local basic_button = {}
    basic_button.label = tostring(value2)
    basic_button.index = 1
    self.editButton(basic_button)
end

function changevalue2(magn)

    updatevalue2()
end

function minus2()
    changevalue2(-1)
end

    changevalue2(1)
end

    if editing == 1 then
        poisonUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    end
    if player ~= 'Purple' then
        return 1
    end
    if editing == 0 then

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad(save_state)
   local button_parameters = {}
   button_parameters.click_function = 'Plus'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '+1'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, -0.7}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'Minus'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '-1'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, 0.7}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'PlusFive'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '+5'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, -2.1}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   button_parameters.click_function = 'MinusFive'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = '-5'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, 2.1}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 600
   button_parameters.height = 600
   button_parameters.font_size = 500
   self.createButton(button_parameters)

   function Plus(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Purple' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Purple'}
       Global.call('lifePlus', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()+1))
   end

   function Minus(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Purple' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Purple'}
       Global.call('lifeMinus', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()-1))
   end

   function PlusFive(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Purple' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Purple'}
       Global.call('lifePlusFive', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()+5))
   end

   function MinusFive(me, player)
       if player ~= 'Purple' then
           return 1
       end
       local function_parameters = {lifecolor = 'Purple'}
       Global.call('lifeMinusFive', function_parameters)
       --local health = getObjectFromGUID('7c193a')
       --health.TextTool.setValue(tostring(health.TextTool.getValue()-5))
   end
end

local basic_buttons = {}
local unit = 1
value = 0
value2 = 0
value3 = 0

basic_buttons['poison'] = {click_function='poisonUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value),position={-1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['exper'] = {click_function='experUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value2),position={0,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}
basic_buttons['energy'] = {click_function='energyUp',function_owner=self,label=tostring(value3),position={1.55,0.21,0.5},rotation={0,0,0},width=500,height=500,font_size=500}

function onSave()
    local data_to_save = {unit=unit, value=value, value2=value2, value3=value3}
    local saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    editing = 0
    if saved_data ~= nil and saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        value = loaded_data.value
        value2 = loaded_data.value2
        value3 = loaded_data.value3
        unit = loaded_data.unit
    else
        value = 0
        value2 = 0
        value3 = 0
        unit = 1

    end
    value = 0
    value2 = 0
    value3 = 0
    for i,v in pairs(basic_buttons) do
        self.createButton(v)
    end
end

-- functions
function poisonUp(me, player)
    if editing == 2 then
        experUp(me, player)
    elseif editing == 3 then
        energyUp(me, player)

   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, -0.7}

   button_parameters.height = 600

   button_parameters.height = 600

function onLoad(save_state)
   local button_parameters = {}
   button_parameters.click_function = 'Mulligan'
   button_parameters.function_owner = self
   button_parameters.label = 'Mulligan'
   button_parameters.position = {0, 1, 0}
   button_parameters.rotation = {0,-90,0}
   button_parameters.width = 2000
   button_parameters.height = 400
   button_parameters.font_size = 300
   self.createButton(button_parameters)
end

function Mulligan(me, player)
    if player ~= 'White' then
        return 1
    end
    local deckzone = getObjectFromGUID('70b368')
    local zoneobjects = deckzone.getObjects()

    for i, v in ipairs(zoneobjects) do
        if v.tag == "Deck" then
           local handzone = getObjectFromGUID('04f3c1')
           count = handzone.getObjects()
           v.reset()
           v.shuffle()
           v.shuffle()
           v.shuffle()
           local parameters = {}
           parameters.identifier = 'timer1'
           parameters.function_name = 'mulliganNow'
           parameters.function_owner = self
           parameters.delay = 0.5
           parameters.repetitions = 1
           Timer.create(parameters)
           deck = v
        end
    end
end

function mulliganNow()
    if #count == 0 then
        deck.dealToColor(7, 'White')
    else
        deck.dealToColor((#count - 1), 'White')
    end
end

    for i, v in ipairs(zoneobjects) do
        if v.tag == "Deck" then
           local handzone = getObjectFromGUID('098db4')
           count = handzone.getObjects()
           v.reset()
           v.shuffle()
           v.shuffle()
           v.shuffle()
           local parameters = {}
           parameters.identifier = 'timer1'
           parameters.function_name = 'mulliganNow'
           parameters.function_owner = self
           parameters.delay = 0.5
           parameters.repetitions = 1
           Timer.create(parameters)
           deck = v
        end
    end
end

function mulliganNow()
    if #count == 0 then
        deck.dealToColor(7, 'Blue')
    else
        deck.dealToColor((#count - 1), 'Blue')
    end
end
